child.content: This app works best with JavaScript enabled.
Creating a Custom DropdownButton Form Field with Validation
Custom DropdownButton fields with validation messages don't exist out of the box. Let's create one!
If you want to know how to get started with Forms, I'd recommend checking out a recent article I wrote on this subject.
Create a blank project that we can use as a starting point:

child.content: I hope you found this helpful! I'll be continuing to document my journey learning Flutter.

Paul Halliday is an author with a passion for cross platform mobile development. He's a recognised Ionic Community Leader and has created courses, books, and a vast amount of content based around the Ionic ecosystem.
